short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search multiple databses for research sources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lets you search digital libraries and resources by pointing and clicking from your browser window.

Supports: academia.edu, JSTOR, Google Scholar.
(Other sources will be added in future versions)
